document.full_text: since the united states reopened trade with col. muammar el-qaddafi's government in 2004, businesses have witnessed a libyan culture rife with kickbacks, strong-arm tactics and political patronage.
document.title: shady dealings helped qaddafi build fortune and regime
lines_and_colors: since the united states reopened trade with col. muammar el-qaddafi's government in 2004, businesses have witnessed a libyan culture rife with kickbacks, strong-arm tactics and political patronage.
